statements: DELETE FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 AND location = 'Warehouse';
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse' AND quantity > 10 OR usage_description LIKE '%broken%';
DELETE FROM medical_supplies WHERE item_id = 100 AND quantity <= 10;
DELETE FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01' AND quantity > 5;
DELETE FROM equipment WHERE quantity < 10 AND condition = 'Good';

DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE item_id = 101;
DELETE FROM Orders WHERE supplier_id = 201 AND quantity < 10;
